'''14w34c''' is the fifty-first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 19, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140822005833/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w34a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w34d|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref>  which fixes bugs and crashes from [[14w34a]] and [[14w34b]] and removes the [[void fog]].<ref name="void fog"/>

This version was reuploaded to fix a crash with experience.<ref name="reupload">{{tweet|SeargeDP|501759352974622720|If 14w34c crashes for you every time you get experience, just restart the launcher and game and it should be fixed.}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Void fog]]'''
* Removed void fog and the void particles.<ref name="void fog">{{tweet|TheMogMiner|501766046681153536|Removed void fog today. Now we don't need to tick air blocks (seriously, WTH?), and honestly, who actually *liked* the void fog?|August 19, 2014}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* 14w34c (the re-uploaded version) was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
